price: (25) And fear a trial[443] which will not strike those who have wronged among you exclusively, and know that Allāh is severe in penalty.
arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنكُمۡ خَآصَّةٗۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
footnotes: [443]- i.e., an affliction or punishment during life upon this earth.  When corruption spreads among a people, its consequences will affect everyone.
